get.description: Get the details of the authenticated employer

403.description: Company with given name or employer with given email already exists

patch.description: Update the details of the authenticated employer

404.description: Employer with given email or company with given id does not exist

post.description: Create a job application. Only users can access this endpoint.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only users can access, not employers.

get.description: List job applications for a job with a given ID. Only employers can access this endpoint. Returns a list of job applications that were made for a given job. Results are paginated based on page and page_size query parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only employers can access, not users.

403.description: Employer is trying to access job that does not belong to them.

404.description: Job with given ID does not exist

get.description: Get job application for an employer. Only employers can access this endpoint. It returns different details than getJobApplicationForUser.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only employers can access, not users.

403.description: Only an employer that is part of the company that created the job that this application is for can access this endpoint.

patch.description: Change job application status as an employer. Only employers can access this endpoint.

400.description: Invalid status or job application ID

401.description: Unauthorized. Only employers can access, not users.

403.description: Only an employer that is part of the company that created the job that this application is for can access this endpoint.

404.description: Job application with given ID does not exist

get.description: List job applications. Only users can access this endpoint. Returns a list of job applications that authenticated user created. Results are paginated based on page and page_size query parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only users can access, not employers.

get.description: Get job application for a user. Only users can access this endpoint. It returns different details than getJobApplicationForEmployer.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only users can access, not employers.

403.description: Only the applicant (the owner) of the job application can access this endpoint.

delete.description: Delete a job application. Only users can access this endpoint, and only owners of the job application can delete it.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only users can access, not employers.

403.description: Only a user that created this job application can access this endpoint.

404.description: Job application with given ID does not exist

patch.description: Update job application details (message, cv) but only if the status is 'Applied' (the application was not seen by the employer). Only users can access this endpoint.

400.description: Invalid data or job application ID

401.description: Unauthorized. Only users can access, not employers.

403.description: Only a user that created this job application can access this endpoint.

404.description: Job application with given ID does not exist

parameters.description: Salary min - must be smaller or equal salary_max
parameters.name: salary_min

parameters.description: Salary max - must be greater or equal salary_min
parameters.name: salary_max

get.description: List jobs by company name, id or part of the name.

400.description: Invalid query. Only one of the three parameters is allowed.

get.description: List all jobs of an employer. Only employers can access this endpoint. Returns a list of jobs that were created by the authenticated employer. Results are paginated based on page and page_size query parameters.
get.summary: List all jobs of an employer

401.description: Unauthorized. Only employers can access, not users.

get.description: List jobs that match the authenticated users skills

401.description: Employer making the request - only users can access

get.description: Get details of the job with the given id

delete.description: Delete the job with the given id

patch.description: update the job with the given id

401.description: User making the request not an employer or employer not the owner of the job

get.description: Get details of the logged in user

403.description: User with given email already exists

404.description: User with given email does not exist

patch.description: Change / update password of the logged-in user
